overview:
Paul is the co-founder of WikiFun.com

Paul has an extensive business background spending over 20 years working for large corporations. His experiences range from heading internet strategy for fortune 100 companies, strategy consulting with McKinsey&Company, chief information officer and Chief purchasing officer in the United States and in Europe, and other operational assignements. During these experiences Paul has constantly focused on driving corporate organizations to deliver value to local operations.

Paul co-founded WikiFun.com with the objective of delivering social and economic value to local communities everywhere. WikiFun is more Fun everywhere. It is also communication and promotional tools made simple and costless for all fun businesses and organizations.
